thread.title: Rani Padmini songs released
thread.title_full: Rani Padmini songs released - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Rani Padmini songs released
text:
The four tracks of upcoming film Rani Padmini have been released.
Composed by Bijibal, the songs have been written by Rafeeq Ahammed and Nellai Jayantha. The song Varu Pokaam Parakkaam has been sung by Shwetha Menon, Devdutt and Lola, while Chithra Arun has given voice for Oru Makaranilavay . Puthu Puthu and Mizhimalarukal are the other two songs in the film.
Manju Warrier and Rima Kallingal play the leads in Rani Padmini, which has been directed by Aashiq Abu.
